input_email_body:
Subject: 

I recently observed an unanticipated charge on my monthly subscription bill and suspect it might be a result of an incorrect adjustment to my subscription plan You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. After reviewing my account configuration and the invoice, I would be grateful if you could assist in clarifying the situation My name is John Doe.. Kindly investigate this and inform me of the findings or provide a refund if needed.
